scripts.dev:main: nodemon -e ts,js --watch ./src/main --watch ./src/lib --exec "node resources/script/build.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./resources/script/webpack.main.config.js && electron dist/main.bundle.js"
scripts.build:win: node resources/script/build.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node resources/script/webpack.config.js && electron-builder -c resources/script/build.json --win
scripts.build:linux: node resources/script/build.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node resources/script/webpack.config.js && electron-builder -c resources/script/build.json --linux
scripts.build:mac: node resources/script/build.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node resources/script/webpack.config.js && electron-builder -c resources/script/build.json --mac
